org.openexchangerates.client
Class RestClient

java.lang.Object
  org.openexchangerates.client.RestClient

public class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object

A client library for accessing resources via HTTP.

Author:
kgilmer

INPUTSTREAM_DESERIALIZER

public static final RestClient.ResponseDeserializer<java.io.InputStream> INPUTSTREAM_DESERIALIZER
A HTTPResponseDeserializer that simply returns the internal inputstream. Useful for clients that wish to handle the response input stream manually.

getErrorHandler

public RestClient.ErrorHandler getErrorHandler()
Returns:
ErrorHandler

setErrorHandler

public void setErrorHandler(RestClient.ErrorHandler handler)
Sets an error handler for the client. If no error handler is set, HTTP (application level) errors will be ignored by the client. Creating a custom ErrorHandler let's the client handle specific errors from the server in an application specific way. See also: THROW_ALL_ERRORS, THROW_5XX_ERRORS

Parameters:
handler - ErrorHandler

setDebugWriter

public void setDebugWriter(java.io.PrintWriter writer)
Sets a debug OutputStream for the client. If null is passed, no debug output will be generated.

Parameters:
debugStream - OutputStream

call

public <T> RestClient.Response<T> call(RestClient.HttpMethod method,
                                       java.lang.String url,
                                       RestClient.ResponseDeserializer<T> deserializer,
                                       java.io.InputStream content,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
                            throws java.io.IOException
This is the primary call in RestClient. All other HTTP method calls call this method with some specific parameters. For flexibility this method is exposed to clients but should not be used in a majority of cases. See callGet(), callPost() etc. for the simplest usage. This call is asynchronous, the Response works like a Future. This method handles errors based on how the client is configured. If no Deserializer or ErrorHander is specified the response content will produce null. The response class will contain the HTTP error information.

Type Parameters:
T - type to deserialize to
Parameters:
method - HTTP method. Cannot be null.
url - url of server. Cannot be null.
deserializer - class to deserialize the response body. If null then response is deserialized to a String.
content - Optional content to pass to server, can be null.
headers - HTTP headers that should be appended to the call. These are in addition to any headers set in any ConnectionInitializers associated with client.
Returns:
deserialized response
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error

callGet

public java.lang.String callGet(java.lang.Object url)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Execute GET method and return body as a string. This call blocks until the response content is deserialized into a String.

Parameters:
url - of server. If not String, toString() will be called.
Returns:
body as a String
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error

createMultipartPostBody

public static java.io.InputStream createMultipartPostBody(java.lang.String boundary,
                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> content)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
Create a buffer for a multi-part POST body, and return an input stream to the buffer.

Parameters:
boundary - String use use to signify end of part.
content - A map of The values can either be of type String, RestClient.FormInputStream, or type RestClient.FormFile. Other types will cause an IllegalArgumentException.
Returns:
an input stream of buffer of POST body.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error.

buildURL

public RestClient.URLBuilder buildURL(java.lang.String... segment)
Build a URL with the URLBuilder utility interface. This interface will clean extra/missing path segment terminators and handle schemes.

Parameters:
segment - set of segments that compose the url.
Returns:
an instance of URLBuilder with complete url.
